articles.author: Ryan Young
articles.title: Aces star A'ja Wilson breaks WNBA single-season scoring record, passing Jewel Lloyd - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: A'ja Wilson broke Jewel Lloyd's single-season record early on Wednesday night in their matchup with Caitlin Clark and the Indiana Fever.
articles.content:
Las Vegas Aces star A'ja Wilson made WNBA history on Wednesday night.
Wilson, early in Vegas' 86-75 win over Caitlin Clark and the Indiana Fever, broke the league's single-season scoring record. Wil… [+2161 chars]
